about_the_game: Based on the MG Metro 6R4 mid-engined Group B rally car, the rallycross version sported a number of upgrades and modifications, for example forced induction, something not seen on the Group B rally car. This car was popular amongst European Rallycross drivers in the late 1980s.
detailed_description: Based on the MG Metro 6R4 mid-engined Group B rally car, the rallycross version sported a number of upgrades and modifications, for example forced induction, something not seen on the Group B rally car. This car was popular amongst European Rallycross drivers in the late 1980s.
